member.name: ITEMSPACING
member.summary: Stores the dimensions of the two possible sizes of icon spacing that are available for display: small and large. Used by .

member.name: ITEMSPACING.cxSmall
member.summary: The width of the spacing between icons in small icon mode, in pixels.

member.name: ITEMSPACING.cySmall
member.summary: The height of the spacing between icons in small icon mode, in pixels.

member.name: ITEMSPACING.cxLarge
member.summary: The width of the spacing between icons in large icon mode, in pixels.

member.name: ITEMSPACING.cyLarge
member.summary: The height of the spacing between icons in large icon mode, in pixels.
